name: Bacciz
tag_list: apple, app, app-developer, developer, application, application-developer, education, educational-apps, apps-for-education, book, book-app, app-book, book-developer, book-app-developer, animation, fun, 3d, physics, app-physics, physics-in-apps, book-servic
overview:
We develop Apps for Mobile devices like the iPhone and iPad, as well as the Android platform.

Bacciz has talented and very creative people that have passion for entertaining and educating. The latest products include book apps that are part of the digital revolution in education, and an educational app that teaches children to improve their writing skills.

Bacciz apps have been featured in Apple’s Whats Hot, Staff Favorites, TUAW, and in Gizmodo as “Best Apps for Kids” among others.
